result.execSummary:
The defendant Michelle P Spanbauer was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.

-Defendant is to complete an alcohol and drug abuse assessment (AODA) and comply with any follow-up counseling as recommended.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to complete and submit proof of completion to the Clerk of Courts Office and the District Attorney's Office.
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michelle P Spanbauer

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Michelle P Spanbauer
Current: 167B Huron St, Berlin, WI 54923 United States  (Effective: 03-08-2016)
Prior: 143 Water St Apt 102, Berlin, WI 54923 United States

2:21 p.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Barb Privat.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Privat - defendant will enter a plea and needs to complete a plea questionnaire.

Court adjourned at 2:21 p.m.

Court reconvenes at 2:47 p.m.  Same appearances.  Court recites agreement - defendant will plea to the charge with a fine and costs, AODA and DNA surcharge.  State concurs.  Atty Privat concurs.  Defendant concurs.

Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of GUILTY.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty as charged.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Sentencing statement by DA.  Sentencing statement by Atty Privat.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

-$100 fine plus court costs - Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-AODA and any follow-up - to be completed within 60 days and proof of compliance to be filed with the clerk of court office and DA's office
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

Court adjourned at 2:52 p.m.

ADDRESS INFO for Michelle P Spanbauer
Current: 143 Water St Apt 102, Berlin, WI 54923 United States  (Effective: 11-24-2015)
Prior: 165 W Marquette St  PO Box 88, Berlin, WI 54923
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

9:08 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  Defendant enters a plea of NOT GUILTY.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond and conditions of:  Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.  Court will set for Status Hearing on December 22, 2015 at 9:15 a.m.

Court adjourned at 9:09 a.m.
